T端may is a PhD candidate and works on statistical and machine learning methods for multi-omics data analysis. Additionally he develops computational tools to study gene functions of gut microbes.

Previously T端may studied Biotechnology at the University of Natural Resources and Life Sciences (BOKU) in Vienna.
